queryDefinitions.name: Business/Business event GIVE KUDOS
queryDefinitions.queryString:
fields @timestamp, event_name, @message, parameters.RequestBody 
| filter event_category = "BUSINESS_EVENT" and event_name = "GIVE KUDOS" 
| fields @timestamp, event_name, @message, jsonParse(parameters.RequestBody) as requestBody 
| fields @timestamp, event_name, requestBody.league as league, requestBody.season as season, requestBody.division as division, requestBody.receiving_team as receiving_team, requestBody.giver_person_name as giver_person_name, @message 
| display @timestamp, event_name, league, season, division, receiving_team, giver_person_name, @message
| sort @timestamp desc 
| limit 10000

queryDefinitions.name: General/Info
queryDefinitions.queryString:
fields @timestamp, log_level, event_category, event_name, source.Class, source.Method ,@message 
| filter log_level = "INFO" and event_category != "BUSINESS_EVENT" 
| sort @timestamp desc 
| limit 10000

queryDefinitions.name: Business/All business events
queryDefinitions.queryString:
fields @timestamp, event_name, @message
| filter event_category = "BUSINESS_EVENT" 
| sort @timestamp desc 
| limit 10000

queryDefinitions.name: General/Errors WARN
queryDefinitions.queryString:
fields @timestamp, log_level, event_category, @message 
| filter log_level = "WARN" 
| sort @timestamp desc 
| limit 10000

queryDefinitions.name: General/Errors ERROR
queryDefinitions.queryString:
fields @timestamp, log_level, event_category, @message 
| filter log_level = "ERROR" 
| sort @timestamp desc 
| limit 10000

queryDefinitions.name: Business/Business event GET <Kudos Standings>
queryDefinitions.queryString:
fields @timestamp, event_name, @message 
| filter event_category = "BUSINESS_EVENT" and event_name in ["GET KUDOS STANDINGS", "GET TEAM'S RECEIVED KUDOS", "GET PLAYER AWARDED KUDOS"] 
| fields @timestamp, event_name, @message, jsonParse(parameters.QueryString) as queryString 
| fields @timestamp, event_name, queryString.league as league, queryString.season as season, queryString.team_division as team_division, queryString.team_name as team_name, queryString.giver_person_name as queryString.giver_person_name, queryString.given_by as given_by, @message 
| display @timestamp, event_name, league, season, team_division, team_name, giver_person_name, given_by, @message
| sort @timestamp desc 
| limit 10000

queryDefinitions.name: Business/Business event ACCEPT INVITE
queryDefinitions.queryString:
fields @timestamp, event_name, parameters.RequestPath , @message 
| filter event_category = "BUSINESS_EVENT" and event_name = "ACCEPT INVITE" 
| sort @timestamp desc 
| limit 10000

queryDefinitions.name: General/All Errors
queryDefinitions.queryString:
fields @timestamp, log_level, event_category, @message 
| filter log_level = "WARN" or log_level = "ERROR" or log_level = "CRITICAL" 
| sort @timestamp desc 
| limit 10000

queryDefinitions.name: General/Errors CRITICAL
queryDefinitions.queryString:
fields @timestamp, log_level, event_category, @message 
| filter log_level = "CRITICAL" 
| sort @timestamp desc 
| limit 10000
